item.title: Potholes, 6th October
item.description:
Potholes need filling end of hall rd - they are getting worse!

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 6th October
item.description:
Highway tree - corner of Charlton Close and Regis Close I have been contacted by a local resident about the loss of this tree, I understand it was not properly staked and has now been removed. Can I ask that it is replaced in the next planting season please,
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandone Vehicle in dangerous location, 6th October
item.description:
The vehicle is parked opposite the exit to 3 houses, the nearest house to the road is the Pynot. It is difficult to exit the driveway, particularly when other vehicles are coming from the left and right.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 6th October
item.description:
NWD WITH GIVE AND TAKE PLUS TEMPORARY FOOTWAY CLOSURE PLEASE CUT OFF X2 2 METERS X1 METER DAMAGED PEDESTRIAN RAILINGS AND TEMPORARY TARMAC HOLES TO MAKE SAFE (Damaged Street Furniture)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Skip, cabin, 6th October
item.description:
A cabin also a skip are on the highways grass verge so destroying the grass also the highways path has been dug up from the front of the house to the road it has been like this for at least 6 weeks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pirton Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Please can you get the temporary traffic lights removed from the junction of manor road and runnings road cheltenham. They are not needed and are constantly holding traffic up. Second to this they keep breaking down. The junction worked perfectly fine before. The new traffic lights that have cost the tax payers money, have now not been commissioned for nearly a year so there must be a fault or the clueless installation team forgot the cables or something as stupid as. Again these are a waste of time, money and electricity. A simple roundabout would have kept the traffic moving, no hold ups and would have been far cheaper to maintain and caused less inconvenience., 6th October
item.description:
Manor road traffic lights
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Information board identifying emergency contact company/number not displayed
